name: DEAD EYES
summary:
*The game will need internet connection at the very first launch (5-10 seconds) to download data. 
-Unknown crashes on iPad 2, iPad mini, iPod 5th gen, iPhone4S- we'd ask you to get refunded if you have issues on your device. very sorry for the trouble!
-There's an engine bug on OS 7.1.2 which cannot be resolved soon-please updated to latest OS to play the game
